input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories don’t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Frosted BH Balsam Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Cathedral Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 3.5' BH Balsam Fir Tabletop Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Broadway Fiber Optics Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Wide Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Norway Spruce Hinged Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Hinged Douglas Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w/ Foldable Metal Stand'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Costway 6Ft Unlit Hinged PVC Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 6ft Premium Hinged Artificial Christmas Fir Tree w/ 1250'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='9 ft. Unlit Premium Snow Flocked Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9 ft. Woodside Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Grand Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='6 ft. Green Unlit Hinged PVC Regular Full Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand'
  - Name='6 ft. Unlit Spray White Green Artificial Christmas Tree with 650 Tips'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 7.5 Ft. Buffalo Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Smart String Lighting'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Ashland Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 7.5 ft. Unlit Flocked Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Noble Fir Artificial Tree with Metallic Urn Base and LED String Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill European Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A full fir tree from a leading artificial tree brand; same core type, function, and intended use. Minor differences may exist in branch density or styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar construction and intended purpose, but a spruce rather than fir. Silhouette and features likely highly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very high similarity; fir tree with a focus on realism and artificial construction. Potential slight differences in fullness or styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Frosted BH Balsam Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir tree, likely similar in feature and construction, but 'Frosted' suggests a possible flocked or winter-themed appearance, which is a minor distinction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Cathedral Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, with potential variation in silhouette (e.g., cathedral shape) but primarily a direct product type competitor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same artificial, realistic construction, but the 'slim' shape and spruce species diverge somewhat from the National Tree Dunhill Fir’s full silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 3.5' BH Balsam Fir Tabletop Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Although the core design is similar (artificial fir), this is much smaller and intended for tabletop, serving a different use case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Broadway Fiber Optics Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree with likely similar shape, but the fiber optic lighting is a significant construction and feature difference from a traditional unlit or lighted tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Wide Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree with a wide silhouette, closely matching the full, lifelike intent of the Dunhill Fir. Very strong match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Feel-Real Norway Spruce Hinged Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar within the same brand and construction. Spruce rather than fir, but elsewise highly comparable in features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Hinged Douglas Full Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Holiday Decoration w/ Foldable Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nearly identical core product: full fir, artificial, hinged branches, and metal stand. Direct competitor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6Ft Unlit Hinged PVC Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Matches the height, construction, unlit, and artificial aspect; unspecified about species but likely highly similar silhouette and intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6ft Premium Hinged Artificial Christmas Fir Tree w/ 1250
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, same height, premium/hinged construction; the number of tips may differ but core features are identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 9 ft. Unlit Premium Snow Flocked Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial, full, hinged tree but flocked and 9 ft tall, which is a major size and appearance distinction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9 ft. Woodside Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (pine versus fir) and much taller, but core artificial tree with similar silhouette and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Grand Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial tree, probably full and realistic, but species and specific silhouette may differ (Alpine, not fir).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Green Unlit Hinged PVC Regular Full Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Stand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Highly similar in size, construction, features and intended use, even though species unspecified.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6 ft. Unlit Spray White Green Artificial Christmas Tree with 650 Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same height, unlit, artificial, similar features; the 'spray white' suggests flocking or color difference which is a minor distinction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 7.5 Ft. Buffalo Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with Smart String Lighting
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, but the 'slim' shape and specific lighting feature/set make it less direct than full-bodied unlit or standard pre-lit models.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Ashland Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, intended use and construction highly relevant. Only brand or styling differences likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 7.5 ft. Unlit Flocked Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir tree, unlit, but flocked and larger size make it somewhat less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 4-ft. Noble Fir Artificial Tree with Metallic Urn Base and LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial fir, but at 4 ft and with a decorative base and included LED lights, this serves a somewhat different use or customer.
